Toggles the ability to place and [[break]] [[blocks]] to enable or disable alternately.

==Syntax==

: <code>worldbuilder</code>

: <code>wb</code>

==Result==

Fails if the player does not have permission to become a World Builder.

On success, toggles the World Builder ability for the player.
